details.contentEn: Since its launch, OpenAI’s generative AI platform ChatGPT has taken the world by storm and brought new people to HKB Tech – not just to learn about ChatGPT, but also how HKB Tech together with its partner UIB make generative AI, conversational AI, and digital avatars easier for companies and government entities to use to decrease costs, increase revenues, and delight users. UIB’s technologies make human-to-machine communication as simple as human-to-human communication. HKB Tech sells solutions with UIB’s two flagship platforms, the UIB UnificationEngine® omnichannel Messaging Service Platform (MSP) and the UIB Unified AI® chatbot builder platform.

details.contentEn: With UnificationEngine, people can talk and text on over 50 popular platforms, including the WhatsApp Business Platform, Facebook Messenger, Apple Messages for Business, Google’s Business Messages, Instagram, X, and more. With Unified AI, companies and government entities can launch chatbots, virtual assistants, and digital avatars for support, sales, scheduling, and dozens of other use cases across every industry vertical in 130+ languages, including Arabic.

description.content: Customers message questions 24x7x365 in natural language text and speech in any language using their favorite messaging apps.
Companies instantly answer questions in their brands’ voice, forwarding new questions to live agents to reply and train the AI.
Prospective and existing customers who know exactly what they want (and don’t!) effortlessly ask questions with zero sales pressure or time constraints.
Shares documents, videos, images, and text with live agent handover (as needed) to answer unique questions and FAQs to move customers through the sales conversion funnel.
Customers authenticate their identity via chat 24x7x365 in natural language text and speech in any language using their favorite messaging apps.
Companies securely complete transactions (including purchases), provide services, and answer questions after verifying the user’s identity.
New people experience one-on-one, bespoke learning at their own pace, including stopping, starting, and asking for needed help at any time.
Virtual assistant/chatbot uses the most effective combination of documents, videos, audios, images, and text with live agent handover (as needed).
Customers and employees can enter all of the required information, including scanning documents and sending photos and videos, needed to complete the process.
Can explain exactly what is needed for each step of the process at the user’s pace, confirming when information is successfully received.
Users receive push messages and can ask questions of the organization's knowledge base i.e., safety, prevention, preparation. etc. for seasonal accidents, natural disasters, and pandemics.
Send out rich media information when and where it’s needed most for scheduled and unplanned events i.e., hurricane season, flu season, earthquake, etc.
Queries on devices, incidents, cleaning, maintenance, repairs, availability, status, supplies, schedules, etc.
Scheduled, sensor-/camera- triggered, and real-time alerts and notifications are received by staff members and connected devices and facilities.

list.listItem: Improved communications result in improved efficiency
